mention.text: Judge Bork , who stood next to the 60-year-old Judge Bork without comment , as an '' impressive legal mind '' and '' a premier
the 60-year-old Judge Bork without comment , as an ''

President Reagan choice yesterday afternoon in the White House press room , lavishing praise on the nominee 's intellectual abilities '' Judge Bork , widely regarded as the most prominent and intellectually powerful advocate of judicial restraint , shares Judge Bork views that judges ' personal preferences and values should not be part of judges constitutional interpretations , '' Mr. Reagan said the 60-year-old Judge Bork described Judge Bork , who stood next to the 60-year-old Judge Bork without comment , as an '' impressive legal mind '' and '' a premier constitutional authority
the most prominent and intellectually powerful advocate of judicial restraint
a woman 's right to an abortion , and Judge Bork 's criticism of sexual privacy
a woman 's right to an abortion
Judge Bork 's criticism of sexual privacy
the people elected representatives , not through the judicial ukase of this court
a University of Chicago law professor
